Package com.orm.androrm

Interface Summary
DatabaseField<T> This interface has to be implemented by all classes, that will represent fields of the underlying database.
Relation  
XToManyRelation<T extends Model>  
 

Class Summary
AndStatement This class represents an AND statement.
BooleanField This class can be used if a boolean field is needed in a model class.
CharField This class can be used for any fields containing strings, that will then be serialized into the database.
ComposedStatement This is the abstract superclass of all composed statements.
DatabaseAdapter This class provides access to the underlying SQLite database.
DatabaseHelper Class to open up a database connection.
DataField<T> This class is the superclass for all database fields, that need a real field in the database.
DateField This class represents a Date field.
DoubleField This is the database field for Double values.
Filter A Filter is used by Filter Sets to create complex queries on the database.
FilterSet Filter Sets are a mechanism, to execute complex queries on the model classes in a very easy manner by using the field names in these classes.
ForeignKeyField<T extends Model>  
InStatement  
IntegerField  
JoinStatement  
LikeStatement  
Limit Class representing the LIMIT statement of the database.
ManyToManyField<L extends Model,R extends Model>  
Model  
OneToManyField<L extends Model,R extends Model>  
OrderBy  
OrStatement  
QueryBuilder  
SelectStatement  
Statement This class is the superclass of all statements.
TableDefinition  
Where Class representing the WHERE clause of the database.
 

Exception Summary
NoSuchFieldException
